TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_trv_Hashim_Thaçi, title = Hashim_Thaçi, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Seediq]}, url = {https://trv.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hashim_Thaçi} }

S.FORM: = Hashim Thaçi = Mntucing hngkawas 1968 idas 4 jiyax 24 ka Hashim Thaçi ga, empklaw ka hiya. Bukung klwaan Kosovo ta sayang o kiya ka Hashim Thaçi, pnaah hngkawas 2016 idas 4 jiyax 7 pnrajing kmlawa klwaan. = Hasimi Taci = Hasim Taci (Kari Albania: Hashim Thaçi, kari Serbia: Hašim Tači, kngkawas 1968 idas 4 diyax 24－), Kosovo seyjicya, brah soto Kosovo, kiya uri u ntumal brah Yugoslavia Kosovo Dukuricu Undo niya. Kiya ka Kosovo dukuricu na Bukung Kosovo Mincu Tang mi sediq Albania dmudul na brah Kosovo Heytay Pnltadan mpdudul niya. Hasim Taci u mniq kngkkawas 1990 pnrdingan u mnuyas Pyasan Tubeyhing Prishtina cida, kiya ka hantay Serbia Congyang Seyhu na cicin laqi muyas. Hasim Taci u mniq kngkawas 1993 tumal mniq Switzerland Zuric na Kosovo llutuc Albania seyji undo, kiya mi pssli Kosovo Hedytay Pnltadan, dmudul spuda biyax mcbu meysa dukuricu Kosovo. Bukuy daw ini dhuq 1 kngkawas ka kcka diyax wada qmlahang tuhunac Serbia hbaraw sediq Albania ka mnou Sng 1/4 dxral niya nniqan. Kngkawas 1997 idas 7, Prishtina cida, Prishtina (Sotu Kosovo saya) tihwang hoying ini dhuq muda pcahu Hasim Taci niqan spngan pnchuwan 10 knkawas, tnyuwan cumi ka 'Muda Dmudul Smicu Cuyi', kiya daw spuda Serbia ka tnpusu Tuhunac Ryeynmong heytay mi keysacu muru pnrngawan knkana lnlingay qnlhangan qm raq Hasim Taci. Babaw niya daw Hasim Taci dmudul Kosowo Heytay Pnltada tnumal kngkawas 1999 na Mccbu Kosovo. Mnhdu mccbu daw UN u snkaul tpaytwan drunanmlahang Kosovo, Hasim Taci daw wada psdhu phiyu Kosovo Mincu Tang. Pnuda mccbu mi wada knbsyaqan kngkawas muda mbiyax muda meysa daw, Hasim Taci na mnKosovo seyhu pa hiti balay daw wada mniq kngkawas 2008 idas 2 diyax 17 mdhu balay pkla kari ptalax Serbia dukuricu, dukuricu dhuq saya wada srwanan knkana qnlhangan Omong mi ssiyaw qnlhangan Albania ka smruwa uri. Kngkawas 2007 Kosowo Gikay seyngkyo (2007年科索沃議會選舉) Mniq kngkawas 2007 idas 11 diyax 17 muda kcka Kngkawas 2007 Kosovo Gikay Seyngkyo cida, wada mangal 35% hyo niya ka hantay Tang Kosovo Mincu Tang dndulan dmudul Hasim Taci, smatang musa mniq gikay tu1 knbeyhing Tang, kiya mi ccngtang Kosovo Mincu Ryeynmong u wana balay 22% ka mnnangal dha hyo. Hasim Taci qulung balay mptuhuy Kosovo Mincu Ryeynmong mpsupu muda pssli ryeynho seyhu, kiya mi Hasim Taci u muda mpcongri nbabaw niya ka hiya. Kiya mi mtbiyax balay dukuricu ka Hasim Taci u wada pusa kari, qulung phyuwan congri ka hiya pa, nasi Amirika, Russia mi O Co Ryeymong ka nmdudul uuda Kosovo pprngawan u ini dhqi psbalay, hiya u mpniq nhdanan diyax idas 12 diyax 10 daw, kasi uuda pkla kari dukuricu. Kngkawas 2008 idas 1 diyax 8, Hasim Taci pa balay bay muda tumal pnsung seyngkyo Kosovo Congri. Hasim Taci u 85 hyo mi 22 hyo wada mbiyax ka Hasim Taci, wada mbiyax mangal Kosovo burah Congri ka Hasim Taci, idas 1 diyax 9, Hasim Taci balay bay muda qmpah Congri Kosovo. Pkla kari dukuricu Mniq diyax tndxral hiya kngkawas 2008 idas 2 diyax 17 babaw cka hidaw 3 ji, Hasim Taci u mniq Kosovo Gikay dmudul kcka tukubeycu kaygi cida Kari Dukuricu Kosovo". Pnkla kari niyi u pkla Kosovo ka 'Mincu, Mbabaw Dxral, Kiya mi Knou Kluwanan Minjoku' na qnlhangan, kiya mi muda smdhu kari kasi ka muda knkana tblayaq smmalu phiyu malu pnluban tuhuy ssiyaw qnlhangan Serbia uri, muda snrnu Serbia u 'Mnrbuq Mi Kndux Ka Rikisi, Qqpahan Smbari, Ppwaluk Syakay' kiya u musa mbiyax balay lmutuc pkrana pnluban dha niyi. Babaw niya daw Gikay u muda pyawcwey, babaw cka hidaw 3ji 49pung ka wada muda "Pnkla Kari Dukuricu Kosovo"; hiti dawmniq 3ji 53pung knkana kwohuy giying u uka pnrngawan wada mnhdu psdhuq matas "Pnkla Kari Dukuricu Kosovo". Hasim Taci u u wada nanaq mdhu balay babaw dukuricu Kosovo daw mwaya balay Congri Kosovo. Kngkawas 2008 idas 6 diyax 6, 1 cuko dmuwi puniq meycu cnbu Prishtina Sosyang kwanti, smatang phuqil Hasim Taci mi ini pndungus. Kngkawas 2011 idas 2 diyax 22, Hasim Taci u wada mbiyax mangal Congri Kosovo dungan. Kngkawas 2016 idas 4 diyax 7 Hasim Taci pa wada psdhuwan phiyu Soto Kosovo. Kngkawas 2020 idas 6 diyax 24, congpu u wa mniq Netherlands Hague na Kwoci Tukubeycu Pankongs pkla kari kokosyo dHasim Keysakuwan Taci mi tnhiqan niya, Kwoci Tukubeycu Keysakuwan Pankongs u tmiyu dsediq niyi pa mniq kngkawas 1998 dhuq 1999 iyax cida snquri Serbia joku, sediq Romu, Kosovo llutuc Albania seyji ini pntna qnita niya u muda mqnaqah cumi mccbu mi cumi smliq pnwaya sediq, wada muda dalih 100ka ndanan dha pphuqil sediq. Idas 11 diyax 5, Hasim Taci u malix qpahun niya Soto Kosovo.

= Hashim Thaçi = Mntocing hngkawas 1968 idas 4 jiyax 24 ka Hashim Thaçi ga, empklaw ka hiya. Bokong klwaan Kosovo ta sayang o kiya ka Hashim Thaçi, pnaah hngkawas 2016 idas 4 jiyax 7 pnrajing kmlawa klwaan. = Hasimi Taci = Hasim Taci (Kari Albania: Hashim Thaçi, kari Serbia: Hašim Tači, kngkawas 1968 idas 4 diyax 24－), Kosovo seyjicya, brah soto Kosovo, kiya ori o ntomal brah Yogoslavia Kosovo Dokorico Undo niya. Kiya ka Kosovo dokorico na Bokong Kosovo Minco Tang mi sediq Albania dmodol na brah Kosovo Heytay Pnltadan mpdodol niya. Hasim Taci o mniq kngkkawas 1990 pnrdingan o mnoyas Pyasan Tobeyhing Prishtina cida, kiya ka hantay Serbia Congyang Seyho na cicin laqi moyas. Hasim Taci o mniq kngkawas 1993 tomal mniq Switzerland Zoric na Kosovo llotoc Albania seyji ondo, kiya mi pssli Kosovo Hedytay Pnltadan, dmodol spoda biyax mcbo meysa dokorico Kosovo. Bokoy daw ini dhoq 1 kngkawas ka kcka diyax wada qmlahang tohonac Serbia hbaraw sediq Albania ka mnoo Sng 1/4 dxral niya nniqan. Kngkawas 1997 idas 7, Prishtina cida, Prishtina (Soto Kosovo saya) tihwang hoying ini dhoq moda pcaho Hasim Taci niqan spngan pnchowan 10 knkawas, tnyowan comi ka 'Moda Dmodol Smico Coyi', kiya daw spoda Serbia ka tnposo Tohonac Ryeynmong heytay mi keysaco moro pnrngawan knkana lnlingay qnlhangan qm raq Hasim Taci. Babaw niya daw Hasim Taci dmodol Kosowo Heytay Pnltada tnomal kngkawas 1999 na Mccbo Kosovo. Mnhdo mccbo daw UN o snkaol tpaytwan dronanmlahang Kosovo, Hasim Taci daw wada psdho phiyo Kosovo Minco Tang. Pnoda mccbo mi wada knbsyaqan kngkawas moda mbiyax moda meysa daw, Hasim Taci na mnKosovo seyho pa hiti balay daw wada mniq kngkawas 2008 idas 2 diyax 17 mdho balay pkla kari ptalax Serbia dokorico, dokorico dhoq saya wada srwanan knkana qnlhangan Omong mi ssiyaw qnlhangan Albania ka smrowa ori. Kngkawas 2007 Kosowo Gikay seyngkyo (2007年科索沃議會選舉) Mniq kngkawas 2007 idas 11 diyax 17 moda kcka Kngkawas 2007 Kosovo Gikay Seyngkyo cida, wada mangal 35% hyo niya ka hantay Tang Kosovo Minco Tang dndolan dmodol Hasim Taci, smatang mosa mniq gikay to1 knbeyhing Tang, kiya mi ccngtang Kosovo Minco Ryeynmong o wana balay 22% ka mnnangal dha hyo. Hasim Taci qolong balay mptohoy Kosovo Minco Ryeynmong mpsopo moda pssli ryeynho seyho, kiya mi Hasim Taci o moda mpcongri nbabaw niya ka hiya. Kiya mi mtbiyax balay dokorico ka Hasim Taci o wada posa kari, qolong phyowan congri ka hiya pa, nasi Amirika, Rossia mi O Co Ryeymong ka nmdodol ooda Kosovo pprngawan o ini dhqi psbalay, hiya o mpniq nhdanan diyax idas 12 diyax 10 daw, kasi ooda pkla kari dokorico. Kngkawas 2008 idas 1 diyax 8, Hasim Taci pa balay bay moda tomal pnsong seyngkyo Kosovo Congri. Hasim Taci o 85 hyo mi 22 hyo wada mbiyax ka Hasim Taci, wada mbiyax mangal Kosovo borah Congri ka Hasim Taci, idas 1 diyax 9, Hasim Taci balay bay moda qmpah Congri Kosovo. Pkla kari dokorico Mniq diyax tndxral hiya kngkawas 2008 idas 2 diyax 17 babaw cka hidaw 3 ji, Hasim Taci o mniq Kosovo Gikay dmodol kcka tokobeyco kaygi cida Kari Dokorico Kosovo". Pnkla kari niyi o pkla Kosovo ka 'Minco, Mbabaw Dxral, Kiya mi Knoo Klowanan Minjoko' na qnlhangan, kiya mi moda smdho kari kasi ka moda knkana tblayaq smmalo phiyo malo pnloban tohoy ssiyaw qnlhangan Serbia ori, moda snrno Serbia o 'Mnrboq Mi Kndox Ka Rikisi, Qqpahan Smbari, Ppwalok Syakay' kiya o mosa mbiyax balay lmotoc pkrana pnloban dha niyi. Babaw niya daw Gikay o moda pyawcwey, babaw cka hidaw 3ji 49pong ka wada moda "Pnkla Kari Dokorico Kosovo"; hiti dawmniq 3ji 53pong knkana kwohoy giying o oka pnrngawan wada mnhdo psdhoq matas "Pnkla Kari Dokorico Kosovo". Hasim Taci o o wada nanaq mdho balay babaw dokorico Kosovo daw mwaya balay Congri Kosovo. Kngkawas 2008 idas 6 diyax 6, 1 coko dmowi poniq meyco cnbo Prishtina Sosyang kwanti, smatang phoqil Hasim Taci mi ini pndongos. Kngkawas 2011 idas 2 diyax 22, Hasim Taci o wada mbiyax mangal Congri Kosovo dongan. Kngkawas 2016 idas 4 diyax 7 Hasim Taci pa wada psdhowan phiyo Soto Kosovo. Kngkawas 2020 idas 6 diyax 24, congpo o wa mniq Netherlands Hagoe na Kwoci Tokobeyco Pankongs pkla kari kokosyo dHasim Keysakowan Taci mi tnhiqan niya, Kwoci Tokobeyco Keysakowan Pankongs o tmiyo dsediq niyi pa mniq kngkawas 1998 dhoq 1999 iyax cida snqori Serbia joko, sediq Romo, Kosovo llotoc Albania seyji ini pntna qnita niya o moda mqnaqah comi mccbo mi comi smliq pnwaya sediq, wada moda dalih 100ka ndanan dha pphoqil sediq. Idas 11 diyax 5, Hasim Taci o malix qpahon niya Soto Kosovo.
